description: Attack Enemy, Gains Brave
name: Attack
note:
<setup action>

clear battle log
display action
wait: 20
immortal: targets, true
hide battle hud
</setup action>
 
<whole action>

if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'

camera focus: user

zoom: 250%, 20

wait: 20

camera focus: target

zoom: 150%, 20

camera offset: right, 50

camera focus: target

zoom: 150%, 20

camera offset: right, 50

move user: targets, front, 20

else

camera focus: user
zoom: 250%, 20
wait: 40
camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20
camera offset: right 50

end

motion standby: user

wait for movement

face user: target

</whole action>
 
<target action>

motion attack: user

wait: 10

attack animation: target

wait for animation

action effect
wait:10
show battle hud
</target action>

description: Defends, gains MP
name: Defend
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

description:
Consume a fallen friend to regenerate health and grow
stronger.
name: Consume Corpse
note:
Need to find a way to replace ID with
multiple characters or just repeat command
with selected characters.

<Custom Requirement>
value = $gameParty.deadMembers().length > 0 && $gameParty.deadMembers().some(member => !member.isStateAffected(13));
</Custom Requirement>
